div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PaymentReconciliation|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `PaymentReconciliation` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `PaymentReconciliation`. Element `PaymentReconciliation` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation.meta`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation.implicitRules`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation.language`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation.text`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation.contained`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation.identifier`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.type` is will have a context of PaymentReconciliation based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `PaymentReconciliation`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation.status`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.kind` is will have a context of PaymentReconciliation based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `PaymentReconciliation`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.period` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation.period`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.created` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation.created`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `PaymentReconciliation.enterer` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `PaymentReconciliation.enterer` is will have a context of PaymentReconciliation based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `PaymentReconciliation`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.issuerType` is will have a context of PaymentReconciliation based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `PaymentReconciliation`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `PaymentReconciliation.paymentIssuer` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `PaymentReconciliation.paymentIssuer` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation.paymentIssuer`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.request` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation.request`.

Element `PaymentReconciliation.outcome` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation.outcome`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `PaymentReconciliation.location` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `PaymentReconciliation.referenceNumber` is will have a context of PaymentReconciliation based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `PaymentReconciliation`.
Element `PaymentReconciliation.authorization` is will have a context of PaymentReconciliation based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `PaymentReconciliation`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `PaymentReconciliation.allocation.target` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `PaymentReconciliation.allocation.target` is will have a context of PaymentReconciliation.detail based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `PaymentReconciliation`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
